nodes.text: Ec Pand was a Mid Rim world that was located within the Ado sector, and was one of the Induparan Crown Worlds.

While fleeing from a rival house on Ec Pand aboard the corvette Indupar Nova, Lady Kalena and her handmaiden Missa were captured by the pirate Captain Urias Xhaxin of Free Lance. Xhaxin held them at ransom for the highest bidder.
